author: AdeelZubair
title: Mini replica of the classic Volkswagen Camper Van!
review:
First Impression:
This was first seen on a September 2013 Store Calender, and it looked just like its big daddy #10220.

Unique Parts:
This set contains one very rare piece: White Plate W. Bow 3X4X2/3 W. Knobs it only comes in one other set in white and is used for the top of the Camper Van. 

Minifigures:
This set does not include any minifigures. This set is not intended for play and is only a small mini build of a Volkswagen Camper Van.

Playability:
This set is not really made to play and is only a complementary set to relate to its Big Daddy #10220.

Build Experience:
This set contains one unnumbered bag. The instruction booklet is folded in the ploybag. The build is very simple and quick.

Value for Money:
This set is available for FREE on orders over £50/$75 in September 2013.

Theme Popularity:
Volkswagen is iconic and can be recognised all over the world as this will be a fine addition to #10220.

Exclusivity:
This set is available at Lego Stores and http://shop.lego.com/ and other selected retailers. This set is available only in the month of September 2013.

Packaging;:
The ploybag is similar to #10220 with a landscape behind it. It has a white box with the sticker sheet.

Growth Potential:
This will do very well as a potential as for people who have #10220 will also want this.

Display Attributes:
Yes, is fairly simple and captures the iconic details of the VW Camper Van at a much smaller scale. It could have a 2x4 Tile printed the whole "V", VW logo and lights. Silver Metallic Rim No.2 Ø11,176X6,2 should have been the wheels instead.

Final Analysis/ Conclusion:
Overall this will be a cool addition for every person who owns Volkswagen T1 Camper Van #10220.

author: DamonMM2000
title: Mini Good
review: If you can't get your hands on the bigger official LEGO VW Van, then at least get this. It nicely replicates its older brother.
